arabic_text: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
translation: We will certainly make them taste some minor punishment[7] prior to the greater punishment[8], so that they may return.
footnotes:
[7] i.e., the calamities and trials in this world.
 [8] In the Hereafter.
